meanings.definition: A mild green chili pepper, often used in Mexican cuisine.
meanings.sent1: I added chopped poblano to the salsa for a hint of spice.
meanings.sent2: The poblano pepper gave the guacamole a nice flavor.
meanings.sent3: The poblano pepper tried to salsa dance with the jalapeno.
meanings.sent4: The poblano pepper stood out in the dish like a green jewel.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the poblano filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A dish made with poblano peppers stuffed with cheese and other ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the creamy texture of the poblano dish.
meanings.sent2: The stuffed poblano peppers were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The poblano dish whispered cheesy jokes to the other dishes.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the poblano dish danced together harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the golden-baked poblano dish made my mouth water.
